keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
#unmapAll
unmap b
unmap B
unmap d
#unmap f
unmap F
unmap gt
unmap gT
#unmap m
unmap o
unmap O
unmap p
unmap P
unmap r
unmap t
unmap T
unmap u
unmap W
unmap x
unmap X
unmap yt
unmap yy
unmap yf
#unmap `
unmap <c-e>
unmap <c-y>
unmap <<
unmap >>
ummap ?

map B LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map <c-'> Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map <c-"> Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map cc removeTab
map co closeOtherTabs
map cl closeTabsOnLeft
map cr closeTabsOnRight
map f LinkHints.activateMode
#map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map gl moveTabLeft
map gr moveTabRight
map gC duplicateTab
map j scrollDown
map J nextTab
map k scrollUp
map K previousTab
#map mm Marks.activateCreateMode
#map mM Marks.activateGotoMode
map RR reload
map tt Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map uu restoreTab
map WW moveTabToNewWindow
map xo createTab
map yy copyCurrentUrl
map pp openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map pP openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map pW LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
map y; LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map yd LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
map \ Vomnibar.activate
map | Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
map <c-f> scrollFullPageDown
map <c-b> scrollFullPageUp
map ?? showHelp
map g@ passNextKey

#map / enterFindMode
#map n performFind
#map N performBackwardsFind
#map v enterVisualMode
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
